channel.title: New Mp5+grenade sound
channel.description:
Hi Please to announce this new pack for the MP5,357,Shotgun and more. Lots of time spent on this. Still tweaking would like opinions.
Thanks and enjoy
also comes with changed explosion sounds
-:UPDATE:-
SCROLL DOWN FOR LINK

item.title: New Mp5+grenade sound
item.dc:creator: Chumbuster
item.description:
amf66:

I’ll have to try out the maps. I remember when they were being made and following the threads in the beginning.

As for the animation revamp - too flashy for me. And the new revolver model ruins the iron sights - it’s almost impossible to hit people at range using the new model.

I never use the iron sights anyway. I like the positioning of the guns better so its a trade off for me. Since I’ve played through a few times I thought id new things up a bit to entice me to play again. I have thought about changing a lot of the scientist voices back to their originals, will take along time.

Read full topic

item.title: New Mp5+grenade sound
item.dc:creator: amf66
item.description:
Chumbuster:

Definitely worth having !

https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-surface-tension-uncut

https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-on-a-rail-uncut

Also Animation revamp is pretty damn good. - https://blackmesa.gamebanana.com/skins/126786

All would make your second play through much better. Only thing I didn’t like about Animation Revamp was the muzzle flash’s so I just copied the original ones back into the appropriate folder. BMS/Particles/ weapon_mp5.pcf, for example.

I’ll have to try out the maps. I remember when they were being made and following the threads in the beginning.

As for the animation revamp - too flashy for me. And the new revolver model ruins the iron sights - it’s almost impossible to hit people at range using the new model.

Read full topic

item.title: New Mp5+grenade sound
item.dc:creator: Chumbuster
item.description:
Kenley:

They are fan favorites on the forum. The guy who made the maps, TextFAMGUY1, joined the Dev Team (or rather the Crowbar Collective?) as a mapper soon after he completed the mods. Not to imply the mods caused him to get hired, but it’s a testament to his mapping skill in general that they wanted him on the team.

Definitely worth having !

https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-surface-tension-uncut

https://www.moddb.com/mods/black-mesa-on-a-rail-uncut

Also Animation revamp is pretty damn good. - https://blackmesa.gamebanana.com/skins/126786

All would make your second play through much better. Only thing I didn’t like about Animation Revamp was the muzzle flash’s so I just copied the original ones back into the appropriate folder. BMS/Particles/ weapon_mp5.pcf, for example.

Read full topic

item.title: New Mp5+grenade sound
item.dc:creator: amf66
item.description:
Chumbuster:

I take it you’ve got surface tension and on a rail uncut?

Actually, no. I’ve been gone from this forum for a while so I’ve missed those. Are they worth installing?

Read full topic

item.title: New Mp5+grenade sound
item.dc:creator: Chumbuster
item.description:
amf66:

You’re welcome. I’m going through my second play through right now and I felt like something was missing with the audio - came to this section of the forum and just happened to see your thread. I’m surprised no one else had said anything before me.

I take it you’ve got surface tension and on a rail uncut?

Read full topic

item.title: New Mp5+grenade sound
item.dc:creator: amf66
item.description:
Chumbuster:

True,

1.5 Re-up - https://www29.zippyshare.com/v/29576091/file.html

Thanks for your help \ opinions, wouldn’t have got this far without you. Shotgun does sound awesome hey.

Sound pack 2:

Contains 1.5 weapon sounds,

ALSO:
houndeye
Vort
barnacle
Zombie
( retro sounds ) - https://www77.zippyshare.com/v/83401879/file.html -

You’re welcome. I’m going through my second play through right now and I felt like something was missing with the audio - came to this section of the forum and just happened to see your thread. I’m surprised no one else had said anything before me.

Read full topic

item.title: New Mp5+grenade sound
item.dc:creator: Chumbuster
item.description:
amf66:

Sounds good, but you’ll probably want to clean up the MP5 folder - there are multiple empty folders inside of it. Good besides that. Shotgun is much much better than stock.

True,

1.5 Re-up - https://www29.zippyshare.com/v/29576091/file.html

Thanks for your help \ opinions, wouldn’t have got this far without you. Shotgun does sound awesome hey.

Sound pack 2:

Contains 1.5 weapon sounds,

ALSO:
Flesh bullet impact
houndeye
Vort
barnacle
Zombie
( retro sounds ) some original sounds still remain. I just changed a few, so there are still a lot of variations - https://www77.zippyshare.com/v/83401879/file.html -

Read full topic

item.title: New Mp5+grenade sound
item.dc:creator: amf66
item.description:
Chumbuster:

V1.5 ALL IN ONE pack. contains the new mp5 sounds and explosion sounds.

a lot more oommfff goodness, trust me you need to hear them in game to appreciate them.

Extract into: SteamApps/SourceMods

Comes with:

Glock - new sound
Mp5 - new sounds
357 - new sound
shotgun - new sound, still wip
Explosion sounds to fit

https://www40.zippyshare.com/v/5842295/file.html - Click the ORANGE DOWNLOAD button

Sounds good, but you’ll probably want to clean up the MP5 folder - there are multiple empty folders inside of it. Good besides that. Shotgun is much much better than stock.

Read full topic

item.title: New Mp5+grenade sound
item.dc:creator: Chumbuster
item.description:
amf66:

I’m liking the 1.4 sounds and the new MP5 so far. All the guns sound good. Before there was always one or two that didn’t sound right.

V1.5 ALL IN ONE pack. contains the new mp5 sounds and explosion sounds.

a lot more oommfff goodness, trust me you need to hear them in game to appreciate them.

Extract into: SteamApps/SourceMods

Comes with:

Glock - new sound
Mp5 - new sounds
357 - new sound
shotgun - new sound, still wip
Explosion sounds to fit

https://www29.zippyshare.com/v/29576091/file.html - re up- 12/09/2014- Click the ORANGE DOWNLOAD button

Read full topic

item.title: New Mp5+grenade sound
item.dc:creator: Chumbuster
item.description:
MSKyuuni:

Not to my preference, honestly. They all seem a bit quiet and unimpressive to me. The quality’s good, just the sounds aren’t my thing. Also, try doing something about the static on the 357 and SPAS sounds, if you can.

I know what u mean, some more OOMMFF!! im working on it

Read full topic

item.title: New Mp5+grenade sound
item.dc:creator: amf66
item.description:
Chumbuster:

Do you think I should bother altering them some more? I am quite happy with the mp5 now

I’ll play around with them in-game and get back to you on that. TBH I’ve just been playing the wav files and comparing them.

Most of the sounds seem pretty good to me in-game. The dual shotgun blast sounds a little too metallic, but it’s much better than the stock sound.

Read full topic

item.title: New Mp5+grenade sound
item.dc:creator: amf66
item.description:
Chumbuster:

Link removed by request of Chumbuster

Change log:

MP5 - 3 diff sound files for each shot
Shotgun - HL1 remastered
357 - HL1 remastered

Still working on Mp5 trying to make a HL1 remastered version

I like the changes. The MP5 sounds much better. It sounds too… too weak with the original sounds.

Read full topic
